resources.name: Retrieve a list of customers
resources.description:
Options:
- ids

Restrict results to customers specified by a comma-separated list of IDs.

- since_id

Restrict results to those after the specified ID.

- created_at_min

Show customers created after a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- created_at_max

Show customers created before a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- updated_at_min

Show customers last updated after a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- updated_at_max

Show customers last updated before a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- limit

The maximum number of results to show.

(default: 50, maximum: 250)

- fields

Show only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of field names.

resources.name: Shopify API
resources.description: Shopify API collection created by ***Tudor Cojocaru***. It includes the most important endpoints for ***retrieving information*** about customers, products, orders, metafields etc. This collection only includes endpoints used with ***GET method.***

resources.name: Retrieve all products
resources.description:
### Options: ###

- **ids:**

Return only products specified by a comma-separated list of product IDs.

- **limit:**

Return up to this many results per page.

(default: 50, maximum: 250)

- **since_id:**

Return only products after the specified ID.

- **title:**

Return products by product title.

- **vendor:**

Return products by product title.

- **handle:**

Return only products specified by a comma-separated list of product handles.

- **product_type:**

Return products by product type.

- **status:**

Return only products specified by a comma-separated list of statuses.

(default: any)

   1. **active:** Return only active products.

   2. **archived:** Return only archived products.

   3. **draft:** Return only draft products.

- **collection_id:**

Return products by product collection ID.

- **created_at_min:**

Return products created after a specified date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- **created_at_max:**

Return products created before a specified date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- **updated_at_min:**

Return products last updated after a specified date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- **updated_at_max:**

Return products last updated before a specified date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- **published_at_min:**

Return products published after a specified date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- **published_at_max:**

Return products published before a specified date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- **published_status:**

Return products by their published status

(default: any)

 1. **published:** Return only published products.

 2. **unpublished:** Return only unpublished products.

 3. **any:** Return all products.

- **fields**

Return only certain fields specified by a comma-separated list of field names.

resources.name: Retrieve a list of orders
resources.description:
- ***ids***

Retrieve only orders specified by a comma-separated list of order IDs.

- ***limit***

The maximum number of results to show on a page.

(default: 50, maximum: 250)
- ***since_id***

Show orders after the specified ID.

- ***created_at_min***

Show orders created at or after date.

- ***created_at_max***

Show orders created at or before date.

- ***updated_at_min***

Show orders last updated at or after date.

- ***updated_at_max***

Show orders last updated at or before date.

- ***processed_at_min***

Show orders imported at or after date.

- ***processed_at_max***

Show orders imported at or before date.

- ***attribution_app_id***

Show orders attributed to a certain app, specified by the app ID. Set as current to show orders for the app currently consuming the API.

- ***status***

Filter orders by their status.

(default: open)
  1. ***open:*** Show only open orders.
  2. ***closed:*** Show only closed orders.
  3. ***cancelled:*** Show only canceled orders.
  4. ***any:*** Show orders of any status, including archived orders.

- ***financial_status***

Filter orders by their financial status.

   1. ***authorized:*** Show only authorized orders
   2. ***pending:*** Show only pending orders
   3. ***paid:*** Show only paid orders
   4. ***partially_paid:*** Show only partially paid orders
   5. ***refunded:*** Show only refunded orders
   6. ***voided:*** Show only voided orders
   7. ***partially_refunded:*** Show only partially refunded orders
   8. ***any:*** Show orders of any financial status.
   9. ***unpaid:*** Show authorized and partially paid orders.
 
- ***fulfillment_status***

Filter orders by their fulfillment status.

(default: any)
   1. ***shipped:*** Show orders that have been shipped. Returns orders with fulfillment_status of fulfilled.
   2. ***partial:*** Show partially shipped orders.
   3. ***unshipped:*** Show orders that have not yet been shipped. Returns orders with fulfillment_status of null.
   4. ***any:*** Show orders of any fulfillment status.
   5. ***unfulfilled:*** Returns orders with fulfillment_status of null or partial.

- ***fields***

Retrieve only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of fields names.

parameters.name: status
parameters.value: {% prompt 'status', 'Status of the order', 'any', '', false, true %}

resources.name: Retrieve specific orders
resources.description: Retrieve only orders specified by a comma-separated list of order IDs.

resources.name: Retrieves a specific order
resources.description:
Retrieves an order by specifying the ID. All fields of an order are returned unless specific fields are named.


- ***fields***

Retrieve only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of fields names.

resources.name: Count orders
resources.description:
### Options: ###


- ***created_at_min***

Orders created at or after date.

- ***created_at_max***

Orders created at or before date.

- ***updated_at_min***

Orders last updated at or after date.

- ***updated_at_max***

Orders last updated at or before date.


- ***status***

Orders of a given status.

(default: open)
  1. ***open:*** Show only open orders.
  2. ***closed:*** Show only closed orders.
  3. ***any:*** Show orders of any status, including archived orders.

- ***financial_status***

Orders of a given financial status.

   1. ***authorized:*** authorized orders
   2. ***pending:*** pending orders
   3. ***paid:*** paid orders
   4. ***refunded:*** refunded orders
   5. ***voided:*** voided orders
   6. ***any:*** orders of any financial status.
 
- ***fulfillment_status***

Orders of a given fulfillment status.

(default: any)
   1. ***shipped:*** Orders that have been shipped. Returns orders with fulfillment_status of fulfilled.
   2. ***partial:*** Partially shipped orders.
   3. ***unshipped:*** Orders that have not yet been shipped. Returns orders with fulfillment_status of null.
   4. ***any:*** Orders of any fulfillment status.
   5. ***unfulfilled:*** Orders with fulfillment_status of null or partial.

resources.name: scarab_queue.liquid
resources.description:
<script type="text/javascript" id="scarab-queue">  
  
var ScarabQueue = ScarabQueue || [];  
(function(id) {  
  if (document.getElementById(id)) return;  
  var js = document.createElement('script'); js.id = id;  
  js.src = '//cdn.scarabresearch.com/js/1C3D4DDBF55F8B63/scarab-v2.js';  
  var fs = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];  
  fs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fs);  
})('scarab-js-api');    
</script>

resources.name: Retrieve a list of metafields that belong to a resource
resources.description:
Retrieves a list of metafields that belong to a resource.

Options:

- since_id

Restrict results to those after the specified ID.

- created_at_min

Show metafields created after a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- created_at_max

Show metafields created before a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- updated_at_min

Show metafields last updated after a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- updated_at_max

Show metafields last updated before a specified date.
(format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)

- namespace

Show metafields with given namespace.

- key

Show metafields with given key.

- type

The metafield's information type. See the full list of types at https://shopify.dev/apps/metafields/definitions/types

- limit

The maximum number of results to show.

(default: 50, maximum: 250)

- fields

comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
